verses.name: John 2:6
verses.text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.

verses.name: John 2:7
verses.text: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.

verses.name: John 2:8
verses.text: And he saith unto them, Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast. And they bare it.

verses.name: John 2:9
verses.text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,
